message_1: John drives his car to work every day. Whenever he drives faster than 60 mph, he arrives at work more than 10 minutes early. Whenever he drives slower than 60 mph, he arrives at work more than 5 minutes late. Today John arrived at work exactly on time. What was his average speed?
message_2: Since John arrived at work exactly on time, his average speed must have been 60 mph.
